name: Ranch Trading
description: This is a table game that requires luck and mental games to win. During the game, players need to calculate the number of cards in their own hand and waste cards, and observe other players' expressions and emotions, among other factors, to determine the size of their numbers when they are the dealer.The process of catching sheep will randomly appear in the process of adding fate cards, and thus make the deal may be flipped at any time in a random situation.The game ends when the number of cards in stock is insufficient to support the next round of play. After liquidation, the player with the most "Sheep Cards" wins.
